channel.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

item.title: [RBX3][Dedicated Servers] - Racks 43S06
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 3, 00:00 - 01:00 UTC

Jan 29, 22:14 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our dedicated servers offer.

Start time : 03/03/2025 00:00 UTC
End time : 03/03/2025 01:00 UTC
Service impact : Servers will be unavailable during the maintenance for 30 minutes.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our infrastructure, we will be relocating racks 43S06 to a new location.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [ERI1][Dedicated Servers] - Rack E101A19/B08/B11/B12
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Feb 20, 07:00 - 10:00 UTC

Feb 3, 12:39 UTC
Update - Operations on this maintenance have been postponed to a later date.

Below is the new schedule:
Start time : 20/02/2025 07:00 UTC
End time : 20/02/2025 10:00 UTC
Service impact : Each server in racks E101A19, E101B08, E101B11 and E101B12 will be unreachable for 30 minutes during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our infrastructure, our teams will migrate servers one by one from racks E101A19, E101B08, E101B11 and E101B12 to rack E105A08.

Jan 23, 16:21 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Dedicated Servers offer on the specified racks.

This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 12/02/2025 07:00 UTC
End time : 12/02/2025 10:00 UTC
Service impact : Each server in racks E101A19, E101B08, E101B11 and E101B12 will be unreachable for 30 minutes during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our infrastructure, our teams will migrate servers one by one from racks E101A19, E101B08, E101B11 and E101B12 to rack E105A08.

Thank you for your understanding.

Feb 6, 22:04 UTC
Investigating - We are currently experiencing an event affecting our Bare Metal Cloud offer.

We are currently experiencing an incident affecting our Dedicated Servers offering, which is causing temporary availability issues in the rack B715A10.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 06/02/2025 21:56 UTC
Customers Impact : All servers in rack B715A10 are temporarily unavailable.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

item.title: [Global][Baremetal] - efiBootloaderPath mandatory as input for BringYourOwnImage BringYourOwnLinux
item.description:
Feb 5, 19:17 UTC
Completed - The maintenance was completed since 05/02/2025 11:30 UTC

Feb 5, 12:09 UTC
Update - The maintenance was completed since 05/02/2025 11:30 UTC

Feb 5, 11:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Jan 7, 15:47 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Baremetal offer.

Start time : 05/02/2025 11:00 UTC
End time : 05/02/2025 11:30 UTC
Service impact : Starting next month, the EfiBootloaderPath will be required as an input for BringYourOwnImage and BringYourOwnLinux operating systems.
Service improvement : This change will enable customers to customize their EFI bootloader path, if you have any questions or need further clarification, please contact Support.

Follow the links below for the documentation.
BringYourOwnLinux: https://ovh.to/G6fxhKL
BringYourOwnImage: https://ovh.to/Zz5mrNL

Thank you for your understanding.
